SummaryEnglish: Matsurika, a lady-in-waiting in the imperial palace, has a special talent—an excellent memory. One day, she is asked to act as a practice partner for a nobleman's arranged meeting, only to discover that her partner is none other than Emperor Hakuyou himself, who wished to try a matchmaking meeting. Impressed by her skill, the emperor unexpectedly tells her to "go pass the imperial examination first." Thus begins the tale of a girl singled out by the emperor in this Chinese-style Cinderella story.
Aliases: 茉莉花官吏伝～後宮女官、気まぐれ皇帝に見初められ～
Matsurika Kanriden ~Koukyuu Jokan, Kimagure Koutei ni Misomerare~
